| History                 = The Gendarmerie Nationale is one of the components of [[France]]'s national defense,{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[France]]'s entry}} and of its law enforcement.<!-- {{r|Marvel Comics Presents #57}} -->

The Gendarmerie attempted to arrest the [[Felicia Hardy (Earth-616)|Black Cat]] in front of the [[Louvre Museum]].{{r|Marvel Comics Presents #57}}
